title: definevalue
author: definevalue
content: Name your price and post I'm also looking for the designer for a custom landing page as well. Quality and custom designers please payment in btc / fiat / eth escrow only available on eth chain using escrow contract.

comments.author: noibla
comments.body: I'm a UI/UX Designer with past experience in this field, and I think I can help you out in this one. Perhaps I contact you for further information?

comments.author: player1001101001
comments.body: Quote from: definevalue on November 20, 2022, 08:49:12 PMName your price and post I'm also looking for the designer for a custom landing page as well. Quality and custom designers please payment in btc / fiat / eth escrow only available on eth chain using escrow contract. Hi there,I'm a graphic designer with intellectual skills and hands on experience. I can design the full brand kit including logo, landing page, app UI, custom banners/flyers, business cards and much more at an affordable price.Payment needs to be escrowed before I start the designing. Looking forward to hear from you.(My estimates would start from $200 which may extend upto $800)

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Hello, I am the owner of a software company with 37 programmers. We create desktop, web, mobile apps and different types of websites, we also do design and video animations. We have been dealing with blockchain and cryptocurrencies since 2017. I would be glad if you could give me more information about your project. DM me your telegram or discord account for further discussion
